I'm currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Economics at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa. My research interest focuses on environmental and resource economics. In particular, I'm interested in climate change and measuring adaptation through statistical models akin to Schlenker, Roberts, and Burke.
